text: Manfred Weber (born 14 July 1972) is a German politician. He is Leader of the European People's Party in the European Parliament since 2014. He has been a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) from Germany since 2004. He is a member of the Christian Social Union in Bavaria.Toby Vogel (November 20, 2014), Manfred Weber â€“ calm conciliator European Voice. On the 5 September 2018, Weber announced his plans to run for President of the European Commission and was elected as the candidate of the EPP on 8 November 2018. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:MEPs for Germany
title: Manfred Weber
